title.rendered: Corendon Dutch Airlines Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Corendon Dutch Airlines is a Dutch charter airline headquartered in Lijnden, Haarlemmermeer. It is a sister company of the Turkish Corendon Airlines and the Maltese Corendon Airlines Europe.

 

 

 Verified & Updated on: 23/03/21

Corendon Dutch Airlines Address : Corendon Dutch Airlines
PO Box 349
1170 AH Badhoevedorp

Phone:  +31 23 75 10 600

Turkey : +90 216 467 67 10
Business hours: Daily  08:30 am – 12:00 am

Belgium : +32 2 722 94 94
Business hours: Monday to Saturday
09: 00-18: 00
Saturday + Sunday
10: 00-18: 00

Netherlands : +31 23 75 10 600
Business hours: Monday to Friday
09: 00-21: 00
Saturday
09: 00-18: 00
Sunday
10: 00-18: 00

KVK nummer: 34390122
BTW nummer van Corendon Airlines: 822330830901

Corendon Dutch Airlines Official website : https://www.corendon.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Corendon Dutch Airlines

  • Boeing 737–800
  • Boeing 737 MAX 9

Corendon Dutch Airlines Baggage Allowance

Corendon Dutch Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Corendon Dutch Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Corendon Dutch Airlines Special Assistance Services :

Travelling while pregnant in Corendon Dutch Airlines :

Expectant mother can travel without a doctor’s report up to 36 weeks of pregnancy (for multiple pregnancies until 32 weeks of pregnancy). After 36 weeks of pregnancy (and for multiple pregnancies after 32 weeks) pregnant passenger are not allowed to fly with Corendon Airlines even if they have a health statement issued by a doctor. From the 24th week of pregnancy onwards, passengers are requested to fill in a health form at the counter during check-in.

For more details visit : https://www.corendonairlines.com/en/page/travel-information/special-assistance/pregnant-passengers

Travelling with pet in Corendon Dutch Airlines :

For more details visit : https://www.corendonairlines.com/en/page/travel-information/special-assistance/pets

Queries handled by Corendon Dutch Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. Corendon

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Corendon Dutch Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Corendon Dutch Airlines : (click on the stars below)
